languages.text: {n}Что-то не сходится. Призраки появляются на окраинах мира и стремятся к сердцу искаженного региона, а не рвутся извне. То, что они различны меж собой, может указывать на две группы призраков, противостоящие друг другу.{/n}

{n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то не сходится. Призраки появляются на окраинах мира и стремятся к сердцу искаженного региона, а не рвутся извне. То, что они различны меж собой, может указывать на две группы призраков, противостоящие друг другу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear at the outskirts of the world and seek out the heart of the distorted region, not trying to get outside. Their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

{n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear at the outskirts of the world and seek out the heart of the distorted region, not trying to get outside. Their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

{n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the outskirts of the contaminated region and seek to find its heart, not coming from within. Their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

{n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the outskirts of the contaminated region and seek to find its heart, not coming from within. Their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

{n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

{n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

languages.text: {n}有什么地方不对劲。幽灵并不是从受灾区域内部出现的，而是出现在这颗行星的外围，之后才冲向核心区域的。除此之外，幽灵之间的外形差异表明，这两群幽灵或许处于相互对立的状态。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有什么地方不对劲。幽灵并不是从受灾区域内部出现的，而是出现在这颗行星的外围，之后才冲向核心区域的。除此之外，幽灵之间的外形差异表明，这两群幽灵或许处于相互对立的状态。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Algo no va bien. Los espectros aparecen en las afueras de la región contaminada y se lanzan hacia su interior, en lugar de proceder de él. Además, sus diferencias sugieren que hay dos grupos opuestos de espectros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo no va bien. Los espectros aparecen en las afueras de la región contaminada y se lanzan hacia su interior, en lugar de proceder de él. Además, sus diferencias sugieren que hay dos grupos opuestos de espectros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}何かがおかしい。レイスは惑星の辺境に現れ、内部から出てくるのではなく、汚染された地域のの中心部を探そうとする。その違いは、2つのレイスの集団が対立していることを示唆している可能性がある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何かがおかしい。レイスは汚染された地域のはずれに現れ、内部から出てくるのではなく、その中心部を探そうとする。その違いは、2つのレイスの集団が対立していることを示唆している可能性がある。{/n}
{n}何かがおかしい。レイスは汚染された地域のはずれに現れ、内部から出てくるのではなく、その中心部を探そうとする。その違いは、2つのレイスの集団が対立していることを示唆している可能性がある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quelque chose ne tourne pas rond. Les spectres apparaissent en périphérie de la planète et semblent chercher à en atteindre le cœur de la région contaminée ; ils ne viennent pas de l'intérieur. Par ailleurs, les différences observées semblent indiquer que nous avons affaire à deux groupes de spectres différents qui s'opposent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque chose ne tourne pas rond. Les spectres apparaissent en périphérie de la planète et semblent chercher à en atteindre le cœur de la région contaminée ; ils ne viennent pas de l'intérieur. Par ailleurs, les différences observées semblent indiquer que nous avons affaire à deux groupes de spectres différents qui s'opposent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Irgendetwas stimmt nicht. Die Geister tauchen in den Vororten des Planeten auf und eilen zum Herz der kontaminierten Region, anstatt sie von innen heraus zu besetzen. Überdies lassen ihre Unterschiede vermuten, dass es sich um zwei rivalisierende Gruppen von Geistern handelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendetwas stimmt nicht. Die Geister tauchen in den Vororten des Planeten auf und eilen zum Herz der kontaminierten Region, anstatt sie von innen heraus zu besetzen. Überdies lassen ihre Unterschiede vermuten, dass es sich um zwei rivalisierende Gruppen von Geistern handelt.{/n}

{n}Irgendetwas stimmt nicht. Die Geister erscheinen am Rand der verseuchten Region und wollen in deren Herz eindringen. Sie kommen nicht aus ihrem Inneren. Die Unterschiede zwischen den Geistern lässt vermuten, dass es zwei verschiedene Gruppen sind, die im Konflikt miteinander liegen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Burada bir şeyler yanlış. Tayflar, gezegenin dış kısımlarında ortaya çıkarak hastalıklı bölgeyi içeriden istila etmek yerine bölge merkezine doğru süratle ilerliyor. Dahası farklılıkları, birbirlerine karşı gelen iki tayf grubu olabileceğine işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is not right. The wraiths appear on the planet's outskirts and rush toward the heart of the contaminated region instead of invading from within it. Furthermore, their differences may suggest that there are two groups of wraiths opposing each other.{/n}
